trends: There have been 106 other sightings in Colorado Springs
There were no other sightings in Colorado Springs on or around July 8th 1977
divs: Sighting Details1.I was sitting in my van that i had just started, in a large parking lot onbase.2.As i was reaching for my glove box to get a cassette tape.3.I thought it was a UH-1 or CH-47 Helicopter.4.I shut off my van got out of if and walked towards the UFO,it was hoveringover a supply and adminstration building.I was shocked to see that it was not amilitary aircraft and that this ufo was descending on top of this building.I wasapprox 30-40 feet from the craft it was quite no sound no wind.As i got to wherei was with the 30 feet or so it can to a hover and remained motionless for a fewminutes and then drifted north towards Denver.Just to let you know during thatnight there were numerous UFO sightings that were reported that night.Also I wasstationed on a U.S.Army installation which sits adjacent to NORAD.6.When it got out of my vision through the cover of darkness.
